means: （天主教教堂里）圣器收藏室，圣器安置所

sentence.Network_en: He even pushed as far as Embrun , entered the cathedral one night, and despoiled the sacristy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他甚至敢于进逼昂布伦,黑夜侵入天主堂, 卷走圣衣库中的东西.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... sacristan 圣器管理人 sacristy 圣器收藏室 sacroiliac 骶髂的.
圣器室（SACRISTY） 教堂主祭坛旁边的一间屋子，或是一间与教堂相连的小建筑物，圣器室用于存放仪式所需的器具和衣物。也称 …
“我来了，法谛玛。”、　　注解注1：更衣室（sacristy）是天主教教堂旁的小房间，供神父作弥撒前更衣，存放衣物，储藏圣器的地方。
...他死后5年(1687)才完成，里面布置却乏善足陈，收藏室(sacristy)却有Titian和Tintoretto的画作。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French sacristie, from medieval Latin sacristia, based on Latin sacer, sacr- 'sacred'

entry.tran: (教堂的)圣器收藏室，圣职人员更衣室，祭衣间
entry.def: A sacristy is the room in a church where the priest or minister changes into their official clothes and where holy objects are kept.

means.word_mean: 1. a room in a church where sacred vessels and vestments are kept or meetings are held

auth_sentence.content: The Holy See is designed to survive the presence of monsters in the sacristy The gates of Hell shall not prevail against it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Holy See is designed to survive the presence of monsters in the sacristy The gates of Hell shall not prevail against it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Holy See is designed to survive the presence of monsters in the sacristy The gates of Hell shall not prevail against it.

auth_sentence.content: When the operation was finished, even the little terra-cotta statues in the sacristy had been methodically decapitated.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the operation was finished, even the little terra-cotta statues in the sacristy had been methodically decapitated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the operation was finished, even the little terra-cotta statues in the sacristy had been methodically decapitated.

auth_sentence.content: In the sacristy, as my father put on his vestments, I watched him become more like Jesus.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the sacristy, as my father put on his vestments, I watched him become more like Jesus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the sacristy, as my father put on his vestments, I watched him become more like Jesus.
